title: Looking for the artist behind Project Zed Splash Art
body: ^ Title says it all, I'm sorry if this is in the wrong section - the forums wouldn't let me create a thread anywhere else.

replies.body: I've been reaching out to who I can, but I haven't quite been able to track down the specific artist for that splash art quite yet. I'm going to keep pestering a few people until I can get some info for you though!

I FOUND IT!!!!!!

It looks like Jason Chan was the artist who did the work for Project Zed specifically! Whew.....boy am I glad to have finally found that xD

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Jason_Chan
Oh wow sick, I didn't know Jason drew that one too. Thanks a lot!

it's like Omega Squad Fizz and Battle Boss Ziggs

pretty sure Jem Flores did Fizz and Alex Flores did Ziggs
